data.title: The Charge of the Light Brigade / The Honey Pot
data.meta_description: The Charge of the Light Brigade / The Honey Pot in Quartet Records
data.text:
Description

Two film scores in one CD composed and conducted by John Addison. This CD brings together two celebrated collaborations by the English composer with two common directors in his career: Tony Richardson and Joseph L. Mankiewicz, dated 1968 and 1967, respectively. Includes a 20-page booklet full of stills and extensive liner notes from both films.
